snippet: In two coming New York shows the Brazilian artist Saint Clair Cemin employs a variety of materials, subjects and sculpture traditions from around the world.
abstract: Brazilian artist Saint Clair Cemin employs a variety of materials, subjects and sculpture traditions from around the world, all of which will be on display in two upcoming New York shows; exhibition of his sculptures will be in parks and pedestrian malls along Broadway, presented by the Broadway Mall Association in collaboration with the Paul Kasmin Gallery, which is also mounting a concurrent show of Cemin's work.
lead_paragraph: In two coming New York shows the Brazilian artist Saint Clair Cemin employs a variety of materials, subjects and sculpture traditions from around the world.

headline.seo: Saint Clair Cemin on Broadway and at Paul Kasmin Gallery
